properties.name: ru.lanit.bpm.jedu.hrjedi.email.mode
properties.description: Mode in which application sends emails: off - messaging is turned off, dev - messages are sent to application email address, prod - messages are sent to actual recipients.

properties.name: ru.lanit.bpm.jedu.hrjedi.email.mailAddress
properties.description: Application email address, from which it sends messages.

properties.name: ru.lanit.bpm.jedu.hrjedi.email.smtp.host
properties.description: Host of smtp mail server that maintains application email account.

properties.name: ru.lanit.bpm.jedu.hrjedi.email.smtp.port
properties.description: Port of smtp mail server that maintains application email account.
